local_intent: Perform the short corrective push on t_block: 0.1m at 45 degrees after re-aligning.
assumptions: Yaw remains suitable from prior step; no change required
Contact-safe approach is handled by ApproachAndAlign at 0.005 m tolerance
coherence_with_global: Implements the corrective push phase following the initial long push, consistent with GLOBAL_BT step ordering (detect/align → push → proceed).
